name: A Square But It Can Jump Pico-1k
name_original: A Square But It Can Jump Pico-1k
description:
Move Left: LEFT ARROW
Move Right: RIGHT ARROW
Double Jump: UP ARROW
Restart: CTRL + R

---------------------------------------------------------

Bounce and jump on the colored blocks to gain points. If you fall you die.

Made in 1019 compressed bytes for Pico-1K Jam 2022
